/auth.password-reset-successfully: An email has been sent to you with the procedure to follow.
/auth.registered-successfully: Successfully registered. You get 30 free trial days.

/dashboard.modal-content-1: factAE est un outil de facturation pour micro-entrepreneurs à 1 €/mois. Son objectif est simple : gérer ses clients, ses devis et ses factures facilement et efficacement. Rien de plus.
/dashboard.modal-content-2: Avec ce compte de test, vous avez accès à toute l'application en lecture seule. Vous pouvez à tout moment créer un compte gratuitement en vous déconnectant.
/dashboard.part-a: The low VAT threshold ({{value}}) corresponds to the ceiling from which you can become liable for VAT (depending on your previous turnover). An overtaking implies:
/dashboard.part-a-1: to check your turnover of the last year:
/dashboard.part-a-2: if your last year's turnover is lower than the low VAT ceiling => non liable
/dashboard.part-a-3: if your turnover for the past year is higher than the high VAT ceiling => liable
/dashboard.part-a-4: if your turnover from the past year is between the low and high VAT ceiling => check the year again before
/dashboard.part-b: The high VAT threshold ({{value}}) corresponds to the ceiling from which you become liable for VAT. This takes effect on the first day of the month, the pre-tax turnover exceeds this threshold. An overtaking implies:
/dashboard.part-b-1: to register the VAT on your new invoices + to reinvoice all those of the current month
/dashboard.part-b-2: to create a pro account on impot.gouv.fr
/dashboard.part-b-3: to apply for an intra-community VAT number with the SIE (Service des Impôts des Entreprises)
/dashboard.part-c: The micro-entrepreneur threshold ({{value}}) corresponds to the maximum ceiling authorized by the micro-entrepreneur. An overrun over two consecutive years implies:
/dashboard.part-c-1: the loss of your mirco-entrepreneur status (changeover in the individual business regime)

/documents.conditions-subtitle: Corresponds to the conditions (payment, delivery, execution etc.) that will appear at the bottom of the document.
/documents.confirm-deletion: Are you sure you want to delete this document?

/clients.confirm-deletion: Are you sure you want to delete this client?

/profile.bank-subtitle: This information will be displayed on your documents, to facilitate the payment of your customers.
/profile.conditions-subtitle: Corresponds to the conditions (payment, delivery, execution etc.) that will be displayed by default on your documents.
/profile.pricing-subtitle: Corresponds to the hourly / daily / lump sum rate that will be displayed by default on your quotes.
